00020 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
00021 #define CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
00022 
00023 #include "parameter.hpp"
00024 #include "parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00025 
00028 namespace clpp {
00029 
00032 namespace detail {
00033 
00039 class unnamed_parameters_handler {
00040 public:
00041     unnamed_parameters_handler( const parameters&                     _registered_parameters
00042                                 , const parameter_parts_extractor&    _extractor
00043                                 , const std::string&                  _name_value_separator ) :
00044             registered_parameters( _registered_parameters )
00045             , extractor( _extractor )
00046             , name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00047 private:
00048     const parameters&                registered_parameters;
00049     const parameter_parts_extractor& extractor;
00050     const std::string&               name_value_separator;
00051 public:
00052     void operator()( str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00053         if ( no_registered_unnamed_parameters() ) {
00054             return;
00055         } else {}
00056 
00057         for ( size_t i = 0; i < inputed_parameters.size(); ++i ) {
00058             std::string& inputed_parameter = inputed_parameters[i];
00059             if ( this_is_unnamed_parameter( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00060                 handle_unnamed_parameter( i, inputed_parameter );
00061             } else {}
00062         }
00063     }
00064 private:
00065     bool no_registered_unnamed_parameters() const {
00066         return parameter::orders.empty();
00067     }
00068 
00069     bool this_is_unnamed_parameter( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00070         return !boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator )
00071                && this_is_not_name( inputed_parameter );
00072     }
00073     
00074     bool this_is_not_name( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00075         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00076                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00077                                            , inputed_parameter );
00078         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00079     }
00080 
00081     void handle_unnamed_parameter( size_t inputed_parameter_index, std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00082         const size_t inputed_parameter_serial_number = inputed_parameter_index + 1;
00083         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00084                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00085                                            , inputed_parameter_serial_number );
00086         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00087             const std::string value_of_unnamed_parameter = inputed_parameter;
00088             inputed_parameter = it->short_name + name_value_separator + value_of_unnamed_parameter;
00089         } else {
00090             notify_about_missing_of_parameter_with_serial_number( inputed_parameter
00091                                                                   , inputed_parameter_serial_number );
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     void notify_about_missing_of_parameter_with_serial_number( const std::string& inputed_parameter
00096                                                                , size_t serial_number ) const {
00097         o_stream what_happened;
00098         what_happened << lib_prefix() 
00099                       << "You inputed unnamed parameter '" << inputed_parameter << "' "
00100                       << "with order number " << serial_number << ", "
00101                       << "but there is no parameter with such order number!";
00102         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened.str() );
00103     }
00104 };
00105 
00106 } // namespace detail
00107 } // namespace clpp
00108 
00109 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
